name: Toaster Jam (itch)
description:
iOS beta: contact @SnoutUp for Testflight invite

Check out the game website: Toaster Swipe Game

Levels to try: ojkjgn, ojj6cj
Harder levels: ojl65l, ojjd27
Level used in Greenlight trailer: ojmhq4

New controls! HOLD to slow movement & RELEASE to jump!

Tweet me your levels: https://twitter.com/SnoutUp

Click to toast! Try level editor.

Level editor controls:

  • choose objects from the tool bar
  • click to place
  • click again for context menu
  • drag to reposition
  • mouse wheel to scroll
  • click "Play" button in the top to test out the level
